content.text: Hello, I love to drive to the beach for a morning walk, do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I enjoy fishing and relaxing. I also enjoy spending time with my daughter.
That is nice, I do not have any children.
Yes, I work as an engineer.
That sounds like a rewarding job.
Yes, it is. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
I love dogs, I do not have any pets.
That is okay, you can always come and visit mine.
Thank you, I would like that.
Great, we can plan a time to meet.
Sounds good, I will send you a message later.
Okay, I look forward to it.
